name: Image Mag
tagline: A modern photography magazine/portfolio/project website design
body:
Image Mag is a concept design for a new kind of online photo magazine. Massive, responsive images and easy-to-understand navigation are at the heart of the design. Would make a perfect portfolio or projects website.

#####View of the featured image

#####Click on each large image to reveal an artist statement and more images from the collection or project

#####Tablet view (iPad)

#####Mobile View (iPhone 6)

##About the design

####Typography

All of the typography is imported from Google Fonts. 

Headings: Fjalla One
Paragraph: Catamaran

####Images

All images are found on the web and cannot be used in a real project. They are only used to simulate a realistic portfolio/project site. The expectation is that you will use original or copyright-free photos when using this as a commercial project.

####Code

All of the code was written by Brian Haferkamp and is made available to everyone through GitHub under the GNU GPLv3 license, [which you can read here](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt). Please respect the license if you want to use the code I wrote.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
